        <description/>
        <name>PPMProjectAccess</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PPMProjectAccess = Class.create();
PPMProjectAccess.additionalTables = function() {
    var additionalTables =  ['planned_task_baseline', 'planned_task_rel_planned_task'];
	var isTestMgmtActive = GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.test_mgmt');
	if(isTestMgmtActive)
		additionalTables.push('tm_test_plan');
	var isAgileActive = GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp') || GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.sdlc.agile.2.0');
	if(isAgileActive)
		additionalTables.push('rm_story');
	return additionalTables;
};

PPMProjectAccess.accessConfig = function(entity, perms) {
    var projectAccess = {};
    var projectTable = SNC.PPMConfig.getProjectTable(entity);
    var projectTaskTable= SNC.PPMConfig.getProjectTaskTable(entity);
    var plannedTaskRelTable = 'planned_task_rel_planned_task';
	var isTestMgmtActive = GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.test_mgmt');
	var isTestMgmt2Active = GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.test_management.2.0');
	var isAgileActive = GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp') || GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.sdlc.agile.2.0');
    PPMDebug.log('PPMProjectAccess.accessConfig: projectTable -> ' + projectTable + " | projectTaskTable -> " + projectTaskTable);
    projectAccess['create_entity'] = perms[projectTable]['create'];
    projectAccess['read_entity'] = perms[projectTable]['read'];
    projectAccess['update_entity'] = perms[projectTable]['update'];
    projectAccess['delete_entity'] = perms[projectTable]['delete'];
    projectAccess['add_task'] = perms[projectTaskTable]['create'];
    projectAccess['indent_task'] = perms[projectTaskTable]['create'];
    projectAccess['delete_task'] = perms[projectTaskTable]['delete'];
    projectAccess['update_task'] = perms[projectTaskTable]['update'];
    projectAccess['create_link'] = perms[projectTaskTable]['update'] && perms[plannedTaskRelTable]['create'];
    projectAccess['update_link'] = perms[projectTaskTable]['update'] && perms[plannedTaskRelTable]['update'];
    projectAccess['delete_link'] = perms[projectTaskTable]['update'] && perms[plannedTaskRelTable]['delete'];
    // Additional Access Config
    projectAccess['add_agile_phase'] = isAgileActive && perms[projectTaskTable]['create'];
    projectAccess['add_test_phase'] = (isTestMgmtActive || isTestMgmt2Active) && perms[projectTaskTable]['create'];
    projectAccess['manage_stories'] = isAgileActive && perms['rm_story']['read'];
    projectAccess['manage_test_plan'] = isTestMgmtActive && perms['tm_test_plan']['read'];
    projectAccess['ds_undo_redo'] = perms[projectTaskTable]['update'];
    projectAccess['move_task'] = perms[projectTaskTable]['create'];
    projectAccess['livefeed'] = perms[projectTaskTable]['update'];
    projectAccess['ds_save_cancel'] = perms[projectTaskTable]['update'];
    projectAccess['create_baseline'] = perms['planned_task_baseline']['create'];
    PPMDebug.log('PPMProjectAccess.accessConfig: -> ' + (new JSON()).encode(projectAccess));
    return projectAccess;
};]]></script>
